item.title: Image Copy Detection for Diffusion Models
item.description: ICDiff, a novel Image Copy Detection system, tackles the unique challenge of identifying replicated content in diffusion model outputs, introducing a specialized dataset and deep embedding method for …

item.title: Replay-and-Forget-Free Graph Class-Incremental Learning: A Task Profiling and Prompting Approach
item.description: Forget-free graph class-incremental learning achieved via a novel task profiling and prompting approach, significantly outperforming state-of-the-art methods.
